doc.previous: There are four major components of public transport with many intermodal interchanges
doc.after: One is the Metro one of the longest metro system in Europe at 286 6 km  Another is the Cercan as local railways used for long distances inside Madrid is faster than the Metro and has less stops inside the center of the city this system has several connections with Metro and Light Metro consisting of nine lines totalling 382 km and 98 stations
